name: Pop or Fail
description:
Description

A simple game written in C using Raylib for 20 Second Game Jam.
You have to pop the circles that match the color of the circle at the top.

Controls
  • 'S' while in the menu toggles sound
  • 'LMB' for everything else
Developers
  • degradka - UI, Game logic
  • mamalord - Code optimization, Game logic
